mapper.insert:
select seq_wenchaxingsurvey_wcxsid.nextval from dual
insert into wenchaxingsurvey(wcxsid,wcxuid,wcxsname,wcxtid,wcxintroduce,wcxpublishdate,wcxfinishdate,status) values(#{wcxsid},#{wcxuid},#{wcxsname},1,#{wcxintroduce},to_date(#{wcxpublishdate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),to_date(#{wcxfinishdate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),#{status})
